title: Virtual Escape Room-Based Pharmaceutical Career Exploration Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic pharmaceutical terminology and general understanding of healthcare systems
context.additional_context: A hands-on experiential education program for career exploration in pharmacy, conducted as collaborative learning activities in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more major roles and educational pathways in the pharmaceutical field through a virtual escape game scenario.
Learners can accurately identify core pharmaceutical concepts (e.g., drug development process, pharmacist roles) with 80% or higher accuracy through in-game problem-solving.
Learners can improve their interest and suitability for pharmaceutical career paths by 20% or more through post-activity self-assessment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
